title: Korean client error
body:
Hello , so i changed the locale.cfg file to ko_KR after this i launch lol and the patch start downloading until 99% its have crash "unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information" but in Korean language i tried to delete everything. but when i back the locale.cfg to (en_GB) its work


PLEASE HELP <3

replies.body: Using languages outside of your[ supported region](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) is at your own risk, and you're likely to run into problems along the way.  Deleting files could also end up causing you more problems as well.  As a result of deleting everything, your best bet may be to [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)the client and continue using language that your region can use.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iB00XObJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-10T19:01:51.445+0000)
>
> Using languages outside of your[ supported region](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) is at your own risk, and you're likely to run into problems along the way.  Deleting files could also end up causing you more problems as well.  As a result of deleting everything, your best bet may be to [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)the client and continue using language that your region can use.  Hope that helps!

i have similar issue: a while ago i could change language via locale.cfg chaging "locale=language_region"
i changed it to "locale=ko_KR" and it worked. Today i get error in korean that i cant understand upon launching the client. i tried ja_JP, ru_RU and both of these work, why korean locale doesnt ?
